text: Tinsley Mortimer and Scott Kluth have been keeping fans on their toes about their ever - fluid relationship status after Carole Radziwill introduced them during Season 9 of The Real Housewives of New York City. Sometimes the socialite and the Internet CEO are on — and sometimes they are off. At the time of the RHONY Season 10 reunion taping, Tinsley and Scott were together after a break earlier this summer — and he was even by her side when she celebrated her birthday earlier this month. As for why they are so on and off, Tinsley offered up this explanation about the dynamic of their relationship, noting that distance plays a big part in why they keep breaking up and making up. ` ` It's never anything specific, which is the most annoying.
